content: 45 k18 k2p2 5 times 42 & 46 k18 k2p2 5 times 43 & 47 knit all stitches 44& 48 k18 p20 49-55 k1p1 ribbing bobble loosely thumbs r & l transfer 16 stitches from waste yarn onto dpn s and pick up an additional 4-6 stitches to close up the gap decrease down to 18 over the next 2 row knit 4 row k1p1 3 row bobble loosely
